A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's bad that I have to give this a half a star to leave a review. The story is probably the worst part. It takes place over only a few hours and feels forced. Random political agendas appear for no reason (for example\, animal rights and \"shame on you for having money\" messages in a casino). Luke Skywalker is like a character you never knew and is extremely unlikable. I've probably already said too much\, so I'll just let you go watch it for yourself. Very dissapointed
